function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sustained decline in the incidence of respiratory diseases, including influenza and measles, but rebounding of rhinoviruses in children after the reopening of schools","Impact":"Potential resurgence of respiratory diseases, particularly in children, after the reopening of schools","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and ventilation in schools to reduce the risk of viral transmission","Technologies":"Air purification systems, antiviral surface coatings, and ventilation systems","People":"Children attending schools, teachers, and school staff","Owner":"School administrators, education authorities"},{"Description":"Significant reduction in ARIs and other infectious diseases during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Decreased immunity to non-COVID-19 infectious diseases due to reduced exposure during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Encourage vaccination, maintain public health measures, and conduct public health campaigns to raise awareness about infectious diseases","Technologies":"Vaccination programs, public health education campaigns, and telemedicine for remote healthcare access","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health agencies","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Harmful collateral effects on health from non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs)","Impact":"Unintended negative health effects due to the implementation of NPIs","Mitigation":"Carefully assess the potential negative health impacts of NPIs and implement targeted interventions to mitigate these effects","Technologies":"Health impact assessments, telemedicine for remote healthcare access, and community health outreach programs","People":"General population, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies"}]}
